actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 105(c) of Public Law 95-344 to extend to five years the period within which the general management plan for the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area shall be developed.

summary.text: Extends, from three years to five years, the period within which the general management plan for the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area in the State of Georgia shall be developed.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 105(c) of Public Law 95-344 to extend to five years the period within which the general management plan for the Chattahoochee River National Recreation Area shall be developed.
